abstract: The group, which included canners and other food industry members, said it was heartened by Dow’s response to its concerns.
snippet: The group, which included canners and other food industry members, said it was heartened by Dow’s response to its concerns.
lead_paragraph: A group representing fruit and vegetable growers and canners has dropped its opposition to regulatory approval of genetically engineered crops resistant to the powerful herbicide 2,4-D.

headline.main: Coalition Drops Opposition to a Dow Engineered Crop
headline.print_headline: Coalition Drops Opposition To a Dow Engineered Crop
